forum.name: updates

forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: Palm vs Finger dot grab optimization

comments.text: Hi! Here are the optimizations of version 152.1 (you're on [version]). Hope it's useful!
When both your finger dot & your palm dot collide with an object, the finger dot will now take precedence! Before it was random, now it lessens accidental moves. Thx Gio & Jinx!
With this change, the palm dot is now also working in the inventory!
this has affected uncollidable hands in areas where one has editor and touch uncollidable, even with change things off. not a real issue but it surprised me until i figured out why
the things i emitted from my hands were shooting off.
emitted things can now stick to your inventory and stay there until switching page.
interesting thanks, we need to look into that!

thread.latestCommentText: interesting thanks, we need to look into that!
